title: Bleeding
steps:
Apply pressure with a clean cloth.
Raise the injured area.
Seek medical help if bleeding continues.

title: Burns
steps:
Cool the burn under running water for 10 minutes.
Do not apply ice.
Cover with a clean cloth.

title: Choking
steps:
Ask the person to cough.
If unable to breathe, give 5 back blows.
Call emergency services immediately.

title: Fracture
steps:
Immobilize the injured area.
Apply ice pack.
Get medical assistance quickly.

title: Snake Bite
steps:
Keep the person calm.
Do not suck the venom.
Tie a band above the bite (not too tight).
Get emergency medical help.

title: Heart Attack
steps:
Call emergency services.
Make the person sit and relax.
Loosen tight clothing.
Monitor breathing.

title: Fainting
steps:
Lay the person down.
Raise their legs.
Loosen tight clothing.
Allow fresh air.

title: Nosebleed
steps:
Sit upright.
Lean slightly forward.
Pinch the nose for 10 minutes.

title: Sprain
steps:
Rest the injured area.
Apply ice.
Compress with a bandage.
Elevate the limb.

title: Heat Stroke
steps:
Move to a cool place.
Drink water.
Apply cold wet cloth.
Seek medical help.
